short_summary: rental and delivery/pickup of light passenger vehicles
full_summary:
Tender Announcement: W0142-24X011 Light Vehicle Rentals  #w0142-24x011

## Introduction
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bidders to submit offers for the rental and delivery/pickup of light passenger vehicles to the Department of National Defence (DND). The contract includes the British Army Training Unit (BATUS) at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield in Ralston, Alberta.

## General Information
* **Reference Number:** WS4389439862-Doc4390694510
* **Publication Date:** January 23, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)

## Description
The bidders are expected to provide light passenger vehicles as listed in the tender document. The purpose of the contract is to rent and deliver/pickup the vehicles to the Department of National Defence (DND), including the British Army Training Unit (BATUS) at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield in Ralston, Alberta.

## Selection Criteria
Bids will be evaluated on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements
The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice URL
The tender notice is available at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18598549?extsite=MTg1OTg1NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18598549?extsite=MTg1OTg1NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
